```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## R Markdown

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot_df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2), 
  y = rnorm(100, mean = 888, sd = 999)
)
```

```{r}
plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
